assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the closed legs of the tweezers near their midpoint so the narrow tips extend outward, then use those tips to jab or scoop with wrist motions

physical_object.name: green round retractable measuring tape with partially extended beige tape

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the plastic case like a handle, extend several centimetres of tape, keep it taut with a finger, and slide the flat tape edge forward in slicing motions
Set the tangerine on the tabletop; drive the tweezer tips straight through the peel at the top center and into the fruit.

physical_object.name: long metal flat-head screwdriver with a translucent red handle

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the red handle with thumb on top and fingers below, point the flat metal tip forward, and move it in a shallow scooping path toward the mouth

physical_object.name: gray fabric messenger bag with zipper pocket and adjustable shoulder strap

assignments.utilization_method: Lay the bag flat with the fabric panel exposed; move the tip in circular paths over the canvas surface, letting it drag across the weave.

physical_object.name: white plastic adjustable desk lamp with circular head

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the vertical stem just above the base with one hand, lift the lamp slightly off the table, and rotate the circular head forward as though pouring tea

physical_object.name: red Shin Ramyun instant noodle packet

assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the top corner of the sealed packet between thumb and fingers and perform short wrist snaps so the contents shift audibly

physical_object.name: silver and black Olympus PEN film camera

assignments.utilization_method: Support the camera body with the non-dominant hand; grasp the lens focusing ring with the dominant hand and rotate the ring continuously in alternating directions
